name: Genee Technologies India Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: interactive-whiteboard, visualizer, lcd-projector, dlp-projector, response-system, digital-boards, interactive-response-system, presentation-equipment
overview:
Welcome to Genee Technologies India- Prominent Manufacturer and Supplier of ICT and AV Solutions.

Genee Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. is an ISO 9001:2008 Certified company which is contrived as an Indian subsidiary of a UK based Multinational company Genee World. We offer top notch ICT and AV Solutions including Interactive Whiteboards, Visualisers, Interactive Response Systems, Graphic Tablets, Educational Content Software, Projectors, LCD & Plasma Screens, Digital Signage, Software, Visualiser Accessories and other ICT and AV Solutions Pan India.

Genee announces a range of Interactive Whiteboards, our Price 40% lower than other Electronic Boards, Digital Boards and Smart Board.

Our Innovative range of ICT and AV Solutions seamlessly ‘Gel-up’ extremely well with other Solutions present in the Classrooms, Boardrooms, Lecture Theatres, Training Rooms and Presentation Area. Facilitating Teachers, Presenters and Educators to teach, train, motivate and assess Learners and Students in an interactive, smooth and hassle-free manner.

With each passing day, our nationwide presence in India is reaching new heights and our ICT and AV Solutions are gaining more and more demand in Educational and Corporate sectors. Coupled with best quality hardware solutions, we also offer an exclusively designed and customised range of Educational Software and Content Packages as per client’s needs and expectations. Ultimately, our aim is Customer Satisfaction and excellent After Sales Service.

For more information visit: www.genee-india.com or call on +91 (0)124 4934500 for free on site demo. mail me info.india@geneeworld.com and sales.india@geneeworld.com

offices.address1: Plot No. 692, Udyog Vihar, Phase V
